tag_list: talent-strategy, corporate-strategy, preipo, startups, recruitment, optimization
overview:
Carol Schultz is the founder and CEO of Vertical Elevation, a management consulting firm focusing on aligning talent strategies with corporate strategies. She was in the Executive Search industry for over 16 years prior to founding Vertical Elevation.

The opportunity to make a difference with her clients and taking their corporations to the top with cutting-edge strategies for building top-performing teams is what drives Carol to work tirelessly for her clients.
